item.title: Johnny Marr: 'Margaret Thatcher didn't make Britain great'
item.description: Former Smiths guitarist says the term 'Thatcherism' is "not a word that stands for something good"

item.title: 'The Avengers' wins top prize at MTV Movie Awards
item.description: Jennifer Lawrence and Rebel Wilson also win awards, while Will Ferrell gets stage-bombed

item.title: Black Sabbath album tracklist revealed
item.description: Eight-track list is leaked to internet

item.title: 'The Hunger Games: Catching Fire' trailer appears online - watch
item.description: The sequel to last year's 'The Hunger Games' arrives in cinemas on November 22

item.title: Empire Of The Sun premiere new track
item.description: 'Alive' is first taste of new album 'Ice On The Dune'

item.title: Hugh Jackman's stalker throws razor filled with pubic hair at him
item.description: The 'X-Men' star is unharmed but described the incident as 'frightening'

item.title: First trailer for new 'Romeo and Juliet' movie appears online - watch
item.description: It's got a script by Julian Fellowes and looks more traditional than the Baz Luhrmann version

item.title: Kings Of Leon to play open air show in Glasgow
item.description: Band announced for Glasgow Summer Sessions on August 15

item.title: Duke Dumont holds 'Ding Dong! The Witch Is Dead' off Number One spot – and BBC does not play track
item.description: Meanwhile, Paramore topple Justin Timberlake to score UK Number One Album

item.title: Justin Bieber pays tribute to Anne Frank, saying he hoped she would have been a 'Belieber'
item.description: 'Baby' singer writes message in the Anne Frank House guestbook in Amsterdam

item.title: Emma Watson pole dances in new 'The Bling Ring' trailer – watch
item.description: Sofia Coppola film is based on the true story of a teenage clique who burgled Hollywood stars

item.title: New 'Iron Man 3' TV spot focuses on Don Cheadle's Iron Patriot – watch
item.description: The superhero sequel starring Robert Downey Jr and Ben Kingsley arrives in cinemas on April 26

item.title: Rare Jarvis Cocker-directed music videos revisited as part 'BUG: Warp Records' special
item.description: Warp Films 10th anniversary showcase, presented by Adam Buxton, also revisits classic works by Aphex Twin & Chris Cunningham

item.title: Gucci Mane arrested day after being released from jail
item.description: Rapper back behind bars for a probation violation

item.title: Janelle Monae announces new single 'Q.U.E.E.N'
item.description: The track, which features Erykah Badu, will be released April 22 and is first to be taken from new album 'The Electric Lady'

item.title: Phoenix joined onstage by R Kelly at Coachella Festival - watch
item.description: The second day of the Coachella Valley Festival of Music and Arts took place yesterday (April 13) in Indio, California.

item.title: Jai Paul releases debut album on Bandcamp – listen
item.description: Self-titled album features 'Jasmine' and cover of Jennifer Paige's 'Crush'

item.title: Deftones bassist Chi Cheng dies aged 42
item.description: Cheng had been in a 'partially conscious state' since 2008 car accident

item.title: Paul McGann discusses possibility of returning to 'Doctor Who' for 50th anniversary
item.description: Actor coy about chances of making appearance in half-century celebration...

item.title: New details of 'The Shining' prequel revealed
item.description: Film will be called 'The Overlook Hotel' and 'The Walking Dead''s Glen Mazzara confirmed as writer

item.title: A$AP Rocky says he is working on 'instrumental' album
item.description: Rapper says he's making his own beats for new project

item.title: Psy premieres new video for 'Gentleman' - watch
item.description: Follow-up video to 'Gangnam Style' finally unveiled...

item.title: The Stone Roses headline first night of Coachella 2013
item.description: Blur and Yeah Yeah Yeahs also perform at Californian bash

item.title: Yeah Yeah Yeahs' Karen O on Lady Gaga: 'I feel there's a core authenticity lacking there'
item.description: 'It's so referential,' says singer

item.title: Deap Vally: 'We'd love to work with Jack White - but we don't think he likes the way we dress'
item.description: 'We're too empowered as women,' says Lindsey Troy
